system.requirements: Any Non-Psyker, RT Rank 3+, Perception 40+. Must have defeated at least one hostile Psyker using non-lethal methods.

description.value:
The hunter of the witch, psyker, and warp-spawn. Honed in mind, body, and soul to battle with the terrors of the warp. Some see the work as divine, some see it is a grim neccesity.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Witch Finder Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Mind Sight, as well as the Psyniscience Skill, even though not a Psyker.

system.effect:

Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Mind Sight, as well as the Psyniscience Skill, even though not a Psyker.
